column4: I forgot, how do I load new fonts onto my system?  I recall there being a terminal thing, stuff to type to update the cache.  Any ideas?  I've already searched Ubuntu Help.
go into synaptics package manager and search for new fonts
I've got the fonts, about 10,000 ttf's . . . I know I can just put them in "/home/username/.fonts . . . but wasn't there something about updating the cache?
the only thing i can think of is "updatedb"
